item.description:
Please join member Cathleen Miller for a small-group skill-share event on the topic of gluten free baking and cooking.  If you or someone you love is (or needs to be) off gluten, this is an excellent event for you.

This workshop will cover the basics of what gluten is and identify major sources in the average diet. After a brief introduction, we will discuss some of the challenges of gluten free cooking and baking, and examine some strategies for embracing the creativity that gluten free cooking can encourage.  We will explore how to create your own flour mixes for baking, and look at different ways to modify or experiment with recipes, including making gluten free recipes vegan. There will be plenty of time for questions and discussion.  Various cookbooks and general information about gluten free diets will be available to examine after the discussion.

Space is limited, but Cathleen is willing to offer this again at a later time if there is enough interest.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Skill-Share: Gluten Free (and Vegan) Baking & Cooking
